title: Kanojo ni Awaseru Kao ga Nai
original_name: 彼女に合わせる顔がない
sinopse:
Mutou is a high school student who was born with no face. He's fallen in love with his childhood friend, Kaori. She can't see his expressions or his gaze, but still they understand one another.

A man's charms don't lay on his face!

(Source: MU)
